title: Langerhans (Dr. Paul)
body: He studied the worms of Madeira in the Zeitschrift f√ºr wissenschaftliche Zoologie (1879-84) and wrote a small book entitled Handbuch fur Madeira (Berlin, 1884).

1879-84: Publication of the articles on the worms of Madeira
1884: Publication of the book Handbuch fur Madeira
